ABOUT.TITLE: Gabriel Alejandro Ramírez Segovia
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Full Stack Developer
ABOUT.INTRO: Specialised technician in web and application development, with experience in complex technological environments and multidisciplinary teams. I have participated in projects related to the migration, development, and optimisation of web applications, mainly with relational databases.
ABOUT.TEXT_1: In 2024, I expanded my professional experience in Cork, Ireland, improving my English and strengthening my ability to adapt to multicultural work environments. This international experience improved both my technical skills and my ability to collaborate effectively with diverse teams.
ABOUT.TEXT_2: Known for my analytical thinking, problem-solving skills, and ability to deliver efficient and innovative solutions. I thrive in both independent and collaborative roles and am always ready to take on new technological challenges.

CONTACT.TITLE: Get in Touch
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to drop me a message by phone, email, or through the form below — I'll get back to you as soon as I can!

FOOTER.LOCATION: Currently based in Madrid, Spain, but happy to relocate if needed.
